title: I made an account just to tell you to watch it.
review: No spoilers.Just made an IMDb account just to give this movie a 10. I've never reviewed any movie online before. But this movie is a perfect 10, and if you haven't watched it then you're missing out on so much.The music, the characters, the voice acting, the plot - literally all 10/10. You'll feel all sorts of emotions watching this movie. Easily one of my top 5
